# Code Files

## testdata/code/main.go

```go
package main

import "fmt"

func main() {
    fmt.Println("Hello, World!")
}
```

## testdata/code/helper.js

```javascript
function add(a, b) {
    return a + b;
}

module.exports = { add };
```

## testdata/code/main.css

```css
body {
    margin: 0;
    font-family: Arial, sans-serif;
}

.container {
    max-width: 1200px;
    margin: 0 auto;
}
```
